title: Can a Rioter Join me for my 1000th game?
body:
*CUE TRUMPETS*

https://i.imgur.com/olANjtK.png/img

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}} 

Nine-Hundred Ninety Nine Games played! (Normals)

In the past I've seen some Rioter's join their fellow summoners on the rift for their 1000th game. I know some of y'all are probably busy, so I don't mind If your answer is no. After almost 2-3 years of consecutive playing, I'd love if y'all would accompany me into my 1000th.
And if that doesn't convince you guys here's some fun facts!

*Fun Facts*

- With an average game of league of legends on Summoner’s Rift lasting about 30 minutes, I have spent 29970 minutes in-game. 29970 Minutes is equal to 499.5 hours or 20.81 days. I have spent almost 3 weeks in the past 2-3 years ganking lanes, dying to jungle creeps, and smackin' Dragons! 
- My favorite position/role is jungle, so you know I'll be supporting you guys through my *SKILLED* ganks!
- I loved Warwick so much when I first started playing, I built a 10 inch statue to commemorate him!
- I recently dressed up as Jax for Halloween by draping myself in purple blankets and taping a lamp shade to a metal rod.
- You can be a part of my 500th win, which means I will hold an exact 50% win rate in normals. 

If you're considering a game with yours truly, I'm under Central Time and I usually am available from 4:00pm - 10:00pm on weekdays, 9:00am - 12:00am on weekends. 

Thank you guys for the great memories I've made so far.
